sections.general: associate vice president for college advancement & public relations executive profile i've worked in higher education administration for 7 years, predominately in advancement and public relations at both the university and community college level. in addition, i've taught or authored over 20 unique college courses primarily in the business discipline currently, i have the privilege of serving mississippi delta community college as the associate vice president for college advancement and public relations. in this role, i serve as the chief advancement & chief communications officer reporting to the college president. a member of the college's senior administrative team since 2010, i also serve on the president's cabinet. as the executive director of the mdcc alumni & foundation, inc., i have overall responsibility for advancement at the college including alumni affairs, annual giving, major gifts, records, planned giving, donor relations, and events. i also have responsibility for public relations including college marketing, communications and news.
